page.title: 09RECREATION SPORTS&CLUBS 1
page.content: {Norton - in - Hales}has the following sports teams :{Two cricket teams playing on the{sports field}behind the {church}. They both play in the{South {Cheshire cricket Alliance. {Market Drayton Ladies Hockey}team play on the{cricket field}.{Darts}and {Dominoes}teams play at the{Hinds Head {Inn}.There is a{grass tennis court}on the side of the{cricket field}that is used during the summer.The following clubs meet in the{village. {Womens Institute}meeting once a month in the{Jubilee Hall}.{Bingo club}each week in the{Jubilee Hall}or{Sports {Club}. For adults{Mothers Union}meet each month at a members house.{Young {Farmers club}meet at the{Hinds Head {Inn}.{Keep Fit},{Mothers and {Toddlers ,Sunday School}and{Youth Club (ten years old and above)meet each week in the{Jubilee Hall.
